resources.string:
This is a MiniMental State Examination.
This app will perform an examination to determine if the patient suffers from Alzheimer's with the hope of diagnosing the disease early to increase the effectivity of the treatment.

This mobile test is meant to be administered to the patient orally by another person. The proctor of the exam will input the examinee's answers into the text boxes, and allow the examinee to perform the actions themselves when prompted by the test.
RESULTS: No cognitive impairment: Little to no risk of Alzheimer\'s
RESULTS: Mild cognitive impairment: Doctor attention might be necessary for Alzheimer\'s.
RESULTS: Severe cognitive impairment: Doctor attention highly recommended for Alzheimer\'s.
This question is unavailable without location permissions. Please move on.
